metadata.title: Acoustic Doppler current profiler data from CCGS J.P. Tully/Parizeau
metadata.description: Acoustic Doppler current profiler data and backscatter data from unit mounted on the CSS Parizeau from 1988-1992, and on the CCGS J.P. Tully after 1992. Various cruise tracks.
keywords: South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: In Work

Maintenance frequency: Annually

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None
